page.title: 03Tourist Attractions
page.content: magnificent views of Falmouth Bay and Harbour,and of the Percuil River. The main attractions to tourists are the beautiful views of the coast and the countryside,the peace and tranquility of the region,and the excellent facilities for watersports. For these reasons,many visitors come to the area each year,not only to stay in the hotels,guest houses and camp sites,but on day excursions from other Cornish resorts.This region is very popular for coach trips and day trips by car. This area is visited by people from all over the world because of its outstanding beauty.There are many coach companies who base their touring holidays in this area.In the early Summer months many coach tours are used by old aged pensioners,but as the Summer goes on,a greater variety of{
